name: Stepping Stone Day Health
description: Helping frail elders and adults with disabilities thrive at home during the COVID-19 pandemic and beyond. SteppingStone is the largest and most experienced Adult Day Health Care in San Francisco. Certified by the California Department of Aging, their programs are designed to help people stay mentally and physically active, reduce isolation and prevent the decline of their abilities. Their highly skilled staff provides individualized health care and social support for each participant’s physical
